content: in the book stacks scarf is an easy one-row repeat scarf that is great for beginners or crocheters looking for a relaxing project the pattern uses the moss stitch a combination of single_crochet and chain stitches to create a thick scarf with beautiful drape depending on the colours you choose this scarf looks great with anything and will elevate a simple outfit while keeping you warm **the free pattern includes step-by-step pictures and a colour changing tutorial to help you ** > find the free version of the in the book stacks scarf ** here 1 ** skill level beginner / easy language english terminology us stitches single chain available sizes designed to fit an adult 6 5 wide x 68 long instructions are included to customize the size of your scarf how much yarn is needed this pattern uses approximately 400 yards yarn worsted/aran weight 4 yarn lion brand heartland about the pdf pattern this 9 page beautifully formatted pdf is ready to print and use it includes the complete written pattern with step-by-step pictures and a crochet chart if you prefer to read from a chart vs a written pattern there are 2 pdfs available one with pictures and one without for easy printing > buy 2 patterns get 1 free with coupon code freepattern add all 3 patterns to your cart and use the coupon code discount will be applied at checkout other details step-by-step pictures are included for the first 3 row as well as a tutorial for changing colour materials 5 5mm crochet hook scissors yarn needle 1 https //thispixiecreates com/how-to-crochet-a-moss-stitch-scarf-for-beginners-day-21/
